word:
THAT IS WHERE THE ROBBERY IS, YOU WILL FIND AS I READ ON FROM TESTIMONY TO TESTIMONY; AND HE 
                                                                           9
TELLS HOW THE ROBBERY WAS ACCOMPLISHED, HOW IT HAS BEEN WORKED. HE LAYS OUT THE SCHEME, AND EXPOSES THE WHOLE THING; SO THERE CAN BE NO DOUBT, AFTER THIS MEETING IS OVER, WHERE THAT MISCHIEF LIES, AND WHAT THERE IS TO DO.
